caption: Returns comparison: BAC, S&P 500, Trefis Reinforced Value Portfolio
trend_summary: This table compares investment returns for Bank of America (BAC), the S&P 500, and a Trefis portfolio. Since the start of 2024 (as of Jan 17, 2025), Bank of America's return of 42% outperformed both the S&P 500 (24%) and the Trefis portfolio (20%). However, for the cumulative period from the end of 2016 to 2025, Bank of America's 153% total return was slightly lower than the S&P 500's 165% return.
author: Trefis Team
article_title: What To Expect From Bank Of America Stock In 2025?
